title: Schindler - revenue 2007 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in billion Swiss francs has decreased over the Year.

Revenue in billion Swiss francs is gradually decreasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2011, slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2016, and finally roughly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Revenue in billion Swiss francs, of value 14.0 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Revenue in billion Swiss francs about 7.9 was reached at Year 2011
